content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
In Julia, Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
using Printf

function wrap_string(lines::String, text_width::Int=10)
    function splitter(acc, word)
        size_so_far = length(acc)
        if size_so_far + length(word) â‰¤ text_width
            return "$acc $word"
        else
            return "$acc\n$word"
        end
    end
    out = foldl(splitter, "", split(lines))
    return strip(out)
end

@show wrap_string("""
It is not the mountain we conquer but ourselves.
""")
```
